title: r/Talesfromtechsupport Their Computer Was FILLED WITH BEES!
description:
r/Talesfromtechsupport A customer called OP because they wanted to report a bug problem. OP couldn't figure out the cause of the bug, but when the customer removed the computer case it became very obvious, very quickly. SWARMS OF BEES flew out the case and started attacking the customer! It turns out that the computer bug was an actual, literal bug problem.
